business.headline: HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank hit record highs after strong Q4: Buy, hold or sell?HDFC Bank rose 1.3% while ICICI Bank gained 0.9% by 9:40 am. Their gains helped lift the Nifty Bank and Nifty Private Bank indices by nearly 2%, and pushed the Nifty 50 up 0.6%, with heavyweight HDFC Bank emerging as the index's top driver.

Sensex jumps 800 points: Why is stock market rising today?Stock market today: The rally on Monday marks the fifth straight session of gains, showing that investor confidence is returning. Both Sensex and Nifty touched their highest levels since January 6.

Explained: Why Yes Bank share price rose nearly 7% todayThe Yes Bank stock was trading at Rs 18.95 on the BSE, marking a 4.75% jump. Gains continued through the morning, with the stock touching an intraday high of Rs 19.37, indicating that it rallied nearly 7%.

Stock market rally: Should investors consider small-cap, mid-cap stocks?With strong institutional inflows and improved breadth in the market, analysts say the coming weeks could favour investors who are selectively increasing exposure to quality names in the midcap and smallcap universe.

Gold prices continue to rise amid global uncertainty. Should you buy or sell?Gold price today: Monday's jump follows a dip in the previous session, where MCX Gold fell 0.44% to Rs 95,239 due to profit booking. But the broader narrative remains dominated by geopolitical and macroeconomic anxiety.

'Era of salaryman is over': Saurabh Mukherjea warns India's middle classSpeaking on a recent podcast titled Beyond the Paycheck: India's Entrepreneurial Rebirth, Saurabh Mukherjea issued a clear and unsettling warning: salaried employment, long considered the golden path to financial security, is dying.
Sensex, Nifty rally as strong Q4 results from banks lift market confidenceThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 635.70 points to 79,188.90, while the NSE Nifty50 added 200.30 points to 24,051.95 as of 10:33 am.

Stock market opening today: Will Sensex, Nifty continue their winning rally?Sensex, Nifty today: While strong results from HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank may help, weak global cues and disappointing Q4 results from Infosys could hold back gains.

Stocks to watch on April 21: TCS, Infosys, Gensol Engineering, HDFC Bank, IndigoShares of several major companies such as TCS, Inofsys, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, BHEL, Gensol Engineering, IndiGo, among others, will be in focus on April 21.

Gensol faces government inquiry after Rs 975 crore EV loan misuse: SourcesAccording to sources, the MCA's move is an independent action aimed at investigating potential corporate governance lapses and financial irregularities. There is no fixed timeline for the inquiry.

India-US trade talks from April 23, tariffs, customs negotiations on agenda: ReportThe Indian official team is visiting the US to give further impetus to the negotiations in the 90-day tariff pause window and discuss these terms of reference to iron out differences on certain issues.

Ford pauses shipments of SUVs, sports cars and other models to ChinaFord has halted exports of key US-built vehicles to China amid rising tariffs and trade tensions, impacting a once-profitable segment of its business, WSJ reports. Engine shipments, however, continue.

entertainment.headline: Sussanne Khan thanks Ram Charan for visiting new store, thanks him for his graceTelugu superstar Ram Charan recently visited interior designer and Hrithik Roshan's ex-partner Sussanne Khan's design studio, The Charcoal Project, in Hyderabad. Sussanne's actor-brother Zayed Khan was also present.

Actor Hayden Christensen confirms return as Anakin Skywalker in Ahsoka Season 2Actor Hayden Christensen is set to return as Anakin Skywalker in the second season of 'Ahsoka', as announced during the Star Wars Celebration in Tokyo.

KGF actor Yash to begin Ramayan shoot, visits Ujjain's Mahakaleshwar temple'KGF' actor Yash sought blessings at Ujjain's Mahakaleshwar temple on Monday. He is gearing up for the shooting of his upcoming film, 'Ramayan', by director Nitesh Tiwari.
Rani Mukerji's Mardaani 3 to release on Holi 2026, first look outRani Mukerji's first look from 'Mardaani 3' is finally out. The film will release in theatres on February 27, 2026.

Twilight actor Kristen Stewart marries Dylan Meyer in intimate ceremonyActor Kristen Stewart married Dylan Meyer in an intimate ceremony held at their Los Angeles home on Easter Sunday. The couple, who began dating in 2019, got engaged in 2021.
Jaat box office Day 11: Sunny Deol film eyes Rs 100 crore despite Kesari 2 clashSunny Deol's thriller 'Jaat' has been going strong at the box office. The film is eyeing Rs 100 crore.

Ajith Kumar's racing team secures another podium finish in Belgium. Watch videosAjith Kumar Racing Team enjoyed another podium finish in the Belgium international event. The actor held the Indian flag high as they stood on the podium.

Rubina Dilaik fumes over death threats to husband Abhinav: Don't test my patienceActor Rubina Dilaik addressed the death threats her husband, Abhinav Shukla, and family received from Asim Riaz's fans. In a social media post, she wrote, "Don't test my patience."

Kesari 2 box office Day 3: Akshay Kumar's film sees big growth on EasterAkshay Kumar's courtroom drama 'Kesari Chapter 2' received a phenomenal response over the Easter holiday. The film earned Rs 29.75 crore in three days.

Aishwarya Rai shares family pic on wedding anniversary, first in over a yearAishwarya Rai Bachchan shared a family picture with Abhishek and Aaradhya, marking their 18th wedding anniversary. Their fans congratulated them on their anniversary.

Stand tall or stay silent: Rapper Asim Riaz's rebuttal to actor Abhinav ShuklaAmidst a heated controversy, rapper Asim Riaz has addressed actor Abhinav Shukla's claims of receiving death threats from an alleged Lawrence Bishnoi gang member. This follows a spat between Riaz and Rubina Dilaik on a reality show, escalating tensions further.

Ajay Devgn, Kajol share sweetest wishes for daughter Nysa on her 22nd birthdayNysa Devgan, daughter of Kajol and Ajay Devgn, turned 22 on April 20. To mark the occasion, her parents shared heartfelt birthday wishes along with beautiful pictures of her.

Katrina Kaif flaunts 'VK' mehndi in cute pic with Vicky Kaushal at a weddingAt a friend's wedding, actor Katrina Kaif showcased a special mehndi design dedicated to her husband, Vicky Kaushal. The intricate 'VK' mehndi left fans in awe and quickly became the talk of the town.

Actor Abhinav Shukla gets death threat from 'Bishnoi gang'Actor Abhinav Shukla has been threatened on Instagram by a person claiming to be a member of the Lawrence Bishnoi gang. The threat follows his wife Rubina Dilaik's controversy with Asim Riaz on 'Battleground'.

Simran criticises co-actor for insensitive remark on doing 'aunty roles'Tamil actor Simran publicly called out a fellow actor for making an insensitive remark about 'aunty roles'. Expressing her shock, Simran stated that she'd rather portray such roles with dignity than take on a meaningless or 'dabba' role.

Disha Patani's sister rescues abandoned baby girl, vows to secure her futureActor Disha Patani's sister, Khushboo Patani, a former army officer, shared a video in which she was seen rescuing a girl child lying in the dirt behind her house.

Malavika Mohanan exposes South industry's 'navel obsession', shares her experienceActor Malavika Mohanan recalled being body-shamed in both the South Indian and the Hindi film industry. She also talked about the South Indian industry's 'naval' obsession.

In Mohanlal's 'too profound for words' moment, a signed jersey by Lionel MessiMalayalam superstar Mohanlal couldn't contain his joy when his friends brought him one of the biggest gifts of his life - a signed jersey by football legend Lionel Messi. Here's what he had to say about that 'unforgettable moment'.

Malayalam actor Shine Tom Chacko's brother defends him in drugs case with sarcasmMalayalam actor Shine Tom Chacko was arrested and later released on bail in a drug-related case. His brother, Joe John Chako, now spoke to the media, and defended the actor by asking if none of them had ever visited a de-addiction centre before.

general news.headline: Murdered ex-Karnataka top cop was having lunch when wife stabbed him: SourcesMore details uncovered during the ongoing investigation into the murder of former Karnataka Director General of Police (DGP) Om Prakash show that he was seated at the dining table having lunch when he was stabbed.

Facing charge of encroaching on executive: Top court on Bengal riots pleaThe Supreme Court has come under criticism from BJP leaders against the backdrop of two important rulings - setting a timeline for the President to take a call on bills and staying of certain provisions of Waqf law.

I killed the monster, ex-Karnataka top cop's wife told friend on video call: CopsIn a stunning twist in the murder case of former Karnataka Director General of Police (DGP) Om Prakash, his wife reportedly phoned the police and confessed to the killing. Meanwhile, their son has filed a formal complaint, alleging that both his mother and sister may have been involved.

BCCI annual contracts: Who's in and who's out and debutants in 34-man listSeveral new players found their names in the BCCI's (Board of Control for Cricket in India) list of centrally contracted players for 2024-25. A total of 34 players were handed the contract by the Board.

Usha Vance in fiery red, kids in desi outfits arrive in Delhi with JD VanceUS Second Lady Usha Vance arrived in Delhi with her husband, JD Vance, and their kids. While she opted for a western look, she made sure the kids embraced their mother's desi roots.

China's big warning to countries striking trade deals with US amid tariff faceoffA spokesperson from China's Ministry of Commerce (MOFCOM) said China respects the right of all countries to address economic and trade differences with the US through consultations conducted on an equal footing.

Sensex soars 1,000 points: Why is stock market rising today?Stock market today: The rally on Monday marks the fifth straight session of gains, showing that investor confidence is returning. Both Sensex and Nifty touched their highest levels since January 6.

US defence chief shared Yemen strike plans in chat with wife, brother: ReportPete Hegseth shared sensitive information - including the flight timings of the combat aircrafts used to target Houthi targets on Yemeni soil - with his family and lawyer.

Why walking is wonderful but won't keep you fully fitFor beginners or sedentary (inactive) individuals, walking can kick-start improvements in blood circulation, mobility, and mental health. However, as you progress in your fitness journey, your body demands more to stay strong and functional.

JD Vance begins India trip with Akshardham visit, bilateral with PM next Live Updates US Vice President JD Vance, along with his wife Usha and three children, is on a four-day visit to India. This marks his first official visit to the country.

BCCI contracts: Rohit, Kohli in top bracket, Iyer, Kishan make a comebackThe BCCI announced the annual central contracts for the 2024-25 season. While Shreyas Iyer and Ishan Kishan returned to the contracted players list, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli retained their places in the top bracket despite retiring from T20Is last year.

Where did Moon get its water from? Big lunar secret revealedThis discovery has big implications for Nasa's Artemis program, which plans to establish a sustainable human presence at the Moon's South Pole.

Delhi man signs up as Blinkit delivery agent, says untouchability isn't just caste-basedA Delhi-based man swapped his desk job for a day to work as a Blinkit delivery agent, and came back with a reality check most people choose to overlook.

Noida's NH-24 choked, security curbs cause rush hour chaosThe gridlock comes amid heightened security arrangements in Delhi-NCR as US Vice President JD Vance landed in India for his first official visit.

JD Vance tours Akshardham temple with family, children wear ethnic attireJD Vance and family landed at the Palam airbase around 9:30 am, where they were received by Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw and accorded a ceremonial guard of honour.

Too polite to ChatGPT? Sam Altman says it's costing OpenAI millionsOpenAI CEO Sam Altman claims that saying "Please" or "Thank you" while interacting with ChatGPT is costing the company tens of millions.
This sherpa guide is thinking of climbing Everest for the 31st time. Key detailsFamed climber Kami Rita Sherpa is gearing up to scale Mount Everest for the 31st time, aiming to extend his own record.

US Vice President JD Vance, wife Usha and children wrap up Akshardham visitUS Vice President JD Vance and family arrived in New Delhi this morning for a four-day official visit to India, marking his first trip to the country since assuming office. Vice President Vance is scheduled to meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi later this evening. High on the agenda will be the ongoing negotiations for a long-anticipated bilateral trade agreement, as well as the status of President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs on Indian goods. These measures, currently on hold until July, have remained a key sticking point in trade talks and are expected to feature prominently in Vice President Vance's official engagements.

Schizophrenic mother imagined things, threatened Karnataka ex-top cop: SonMurdered ex-DGP Om Prakash's son Karthikesh told the police that his mother, the primary suspect in the former top cop's death, was suffering from severe mental health issues. Om Prakash was found dead at his Bengaluru residence with multiple stab wounds.

2 Odisha teens thrashed, forced to drink urine in case of mistaken identityThe duo were tied to an electric pole, thrashed with iron rods, and burned with cigarette butts. One of the victims sustained serious head injuries in the assault.

Disha Patani's sister rescues abandoned baby girl, vows to secure her futureActor Disha Patani's sister, Khushboo Patani, a former army officer, shared a video in which she was seen rescuing a girl child lying in the dirt behind her house.

In pics: JD Vance and family in India on first visit. Here's what they didUS Vice President JD Vance, accompanied by his wife Usha and their three children, is currently on a four-day official trip to India — his first visit to the country in this capacity.

KKR vs GT: Kolkata desperate to bounce back against table toppers in home denIPL 2025, KKR vs GT Prediction: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) are set to take on Gujarat Titans (GT) in their eighth fixture of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). The Ajinkya Rahane-led side will be desperate to bounce back following their embarrassing loss vs Punjab Kings.

Naxal with Rs 1 crore bounty killed in Jharkhand; 8 ultras dead in opThe Central forces on Monday made a huge breakthrough in their all-out offensive against Naxals, killing eight, including a Maoist leader with a Rs 1 crore bounty on his head, in Jharkhand's Bokaro, officials said.

sports.headline: WrestleMania 41 highlights: John Cena creates history after defeating Cody RhodesWWE WrestleMania 41 was full of action. On Night 2, John Cena defeated Cody Rhodes to win a record-breaking 17th title at the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas.

The Ajinkya Rahane-led side will be desperate to bounce back following their embarrassing loss vs Punjab Kings.

Fed up of praising CSK: How Mayanti Langer got Pollard to drop the diplomacyIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: After initially taking a diplomatic tone, Kieron Pollard dropped the filter in a post-match chat with broadcasters, revealing how he fired up the Mumbai Indians dressing room ahead of their thumping 9-wicket win over Chennai Super Kings at the Wankhede Stadium on Sunday.

Still midway through the season, not taking anything for granted: MI Head coachMumbai Indians (MI) head coach Mahela Jayawardene said that the team isn't taking anything for granted and are just midway through their season. MI beat CSK by nine wickets to register their fourth win of the season.

IPL 2025: Shreyas Iyer's sister Shresta hits back at trolls after PBKS' loss vs RCBPunjab Kings' (PBKS) captain Shreyas Iyer's sister Shresta has hit back at trolls following Punjab's loss against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in Match 37 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

MI vs CSK: Powerplay woes keep haunting Chennai in horror IPL 2025 campaignIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Former batter Sunil Gavaskar was clear cut in saying that Chennai Super Kings need to up their game in the powerplay to put oppositions under pressure. On Sunday, CSK lost to MI by nine wickets and kept languishing at the bottom.

Need to be a bit more proactive with bat, we're lacking confidence: CSK head coachChennai Super Kings (CSK) head coach Stephen Fleming said that the team needs to be a bit more proactive with the bat throughout the innings but is lacking confidence at the moment.

High-tempo with smart batting: Rohit Sharma shows his relevance in modern T20 gameRohit Sharma stormed back into form and showed how his ability to tweak his game effectively shows that the MI legend still has a place in the modern T20 game.

IPL 2025 almost over for CSK: Srikkanth's damning verdict after MI hammeringIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Former batter Kris Srikkanth said that Chennai Super Kings' campaign in the tournament is more or less over after their nine-wicket defeat to Mumbai Indians.

Rohit Sharma will continue high-intent game, MI will encourage it: JayawardeneMahela Jayawardene said that Rohit Sharma will continue to play his high-intent game after the MI star came back into form against CSK in the IPL El Clasico on April 20. Rohit was the match-winner for Mumbai as they thrashed Chennai by 9 wickets.

Devdutt Padikkal's IPL resurgence: RCB batter reveals mantra behind formDevdutt Padikkal revealed the success mantra behind the upturn in his form during the IPL 2025 season. Padikkal, after a couple of poor seasons, has scored 180 runs in 7 matches for RCB this campaign.

RCB's home woes down to Chinnaswamy pitch? Devdutt Padikkal respondsDevdutt Padikkal feels that RCB's home woes aren't pitch-related and hopes that they can win in their next fixture at the Chinnaswamy Stadium. RCB has yet to win a home game this season.

Rohit Sharma's form was never a reason to worry: Hardik PandyaIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Hardik Pandya said that Rohit Sharma's form with the bat was hardly a cause of concern for the Mumbai Indians. On Sunday, Rohit's unbeaten 76 helped MI beat CSK by nine wickets.

Rohit back in form: How minor tweaks, no self-doubt helped MI legend vs CSKRohit Sharma revealed the minor tweaks he made and how he didn't allow self-doubt to creep in as the MI legend roared back to form in the thumping win over CSK. Rohit was the match-winner for Mumbai as they beat Chennai on Sunday, April 20.

Ricky Ponting looking forward to rest after hectic stretch of 3 gamesPunjab Kings coach Ricky Ponting is looking forward to taking some rest after a hectic schedule of games in the last week. Ponting's Punjab will play next on April 26 at the Eden Gardens.

PBKS want to put behind batting horror show vs RCB: Ricky PontingPunjab Kings fell to an embarrassing loss in Sunday's match against the RCB. Playing their final match in Mullanpur, PBKS were hammered by 7 wickets. After the match, coach Ricky Ponting said that they want to put this defeat behind them with a week-long rest.

How can CSK qualify for the playoffs after 9-wicket defeat to MI?IPL 2025, MI vs CSK: Chennai Super Kings' hopes of qualifying for the playoffs took a massive hit after their nine-wicket defeat to Mumbai Indians on Sunday at the iconic Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.

Have CSK lost playoffs hopes? MS Dhoni hints at planning for IPL 2026After getting hammered by Mumbai Indians in Wankhede, CSK captain MS Dhoni said that it might be time to shift focus towards rebuilding for the next season. Dhoni blamed the batters for Sunday's loss and said that they failed to provide the impetus at the Wankhede Stadium.

Rohit Sharma magic, Suryakumar 68 helps MI take revenge against CSK in El ClasicoRohit Sharma return to form and Suryakumar Yadav's blistering knock ensured MI crushed CSK by 9 wickets to take revenge in the IPL El Clasico on Sunday, April 20.

Rune stuns Alcaraz in straight sets to win Barcelona Open titleBarcelona Open 2025: Holger Rune beat Carlos Alcaraz 7-6 (6), 6-2 in the grand finale on Sunday, April 20 to claim the ATP 500 championship. Alcaraz won the title in 2022 and 2023 before missing out in 2024 due to injury.

Rohit Sharma returns to form one pull at a time, hits 33-ball fifty in MI vs CSKMumbai Indians opener Rohit Sharma returned to form with a 33-ball fifty. Playing against CSK, Rohit hit 4 sixes en route to his first half century of the season.

KKR not focusing on just negatives after PBKS loss: Spin bowling coachKKR's bowling coach Carl Crowe has said that the team isn't just focusing on the negatives after their humiliating loss against PBKS. KKR were bundled out for 95 as PBKS defended 111 runs, an IPL record.

Evolving backwards: Ravindra Jadeja trolled after woeful innings in MI vs CSKDespite guiding Chennai Super Kings to a respectable total of 176 in Mumbai, Ravindra Jadeja was brutally trolled by the fans on Sunday, April 20. Promoted to No.4 Jadeja struggled yet again to up the ante for the majority of his innings.

RCB brutally troll PBKS after digging out 11-year-old Salman Khan tweetIPL 2025, PBKS vs RCB: Punjab Kings trolled Royal Challengers Bengaluru following their seven-wicket win on Sunday at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur.

Watch: MS Dhoni's wholesome reaction to Ayush Mhatre's fearless debutIPL 2025, MI vs CSK: 17-year-old Ayush Mhatre thrilled the world, including MS Dhoni, with his fearless knock on IPL debut. The Mumbai boy smashed 32 off just 15 balls for CSK at the Wankhede Stadium.

Neeraj Chopra huge inspiration, remains same nice guy I met in 2016: Mondo DuplantisMondo Duplantis heaped praise on Neeraj Chopra and called him a huge inspiration for him. Duplantis recalled his initial interaction with the Indian star and said that Neeraj remains the same nice caring guy.

Virat Kohli follows MS Dhoni, says teammate deserved Player of Match awardIPL 2025, PBKS vs RCB: Virat Kohli was named the Player of the Match award for his unbeaten 73 in RCB's successful chase of 158. However, he felt Devdutt Padikkal deserved the award for his quick-fire 61 in Mullanpur.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
